oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Doors Open Alberta
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Local History
Communities
Social History
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This site promotes Doors Open Alberta-an annual special event that showcases the architectural heritage of Alberta. Visit the site to find out about our architectural history and different kinds of buildings from modest to extravagant.
